sex.Description: Sex of the participant as reported by the participant

age.Description: Age of the participant at time of *first* visit

age_at_death.Description: Age of the participant at time of death

ses.Description: Socioeconomic status, assessed by the Hollingshead Index of Social Position and classified into categories from 1 (highest status) to 5 (lowest status) (Hollingshead, 1957).

race.Description: What does the subject report as his or her race?

Levels.H: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

race_aian.Description: American Indian or Alaska Native reported as a race

race_nhpi.Description: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander reported as a race

dadem.Description: Does/did subject's father have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?

momdem.Description: Does/did subject's mother have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?
